name: UNEALIA (victordoru)
description:
Unealia is a 2-4 players local-multiplayer party game. Compete to destroy friendships in the collections of minigames!

It has been developed by 5 students from "Grado en Multimedia" (UPC).

 Although all the members have participated in all the tasks, the team is made up of two main programmers, Víctor Domínguez and  Jorge Mateo Ortiz, two  3D modeler, Ignacio Solera and Pere Balasch,  and one creative director, Enric Palà.

We hope you enjoy!
